title: Grading of glioma tumors using digital holographic microscopy
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Violeta L. Calin, Mona Mihailescu, George E.D. Petrescu, Mihai Gheorghe Lisievici, Nicolae Tarba, Daniel Calin, Victor Gabriel Ungureanu, Diana Pasov, Felix M. Brehar, Radu M. Gorgan, Mihaela G. Moisescu, Tudor Savopol
